meanings.definition: A board game played with dice and tokens.
meanings.sent1: We had a fun time playing parchesi with our friends last night.
meanings.sent2: The family gathered around the table to enjoy a game of parchesi.
meanings.sent3: During the power outage, we entertained ourselves by playing parchesi by candlelight.
meanings.sent4: Life is like a game of parchesi, full of unexpected twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The colorful tokens in parchesi make the game visually appealing.

meanings.definition: To play the board game Parcheesi.
meanings.sent1: Let's parchesi together after dinner, it will be so much fun!
meanings.sent2: She parchesied with her siblings every weekend.
meanings.sent3: When feeling bored, they would often parchesi to pass the time.
meanings.sent4: His strategic moves in parchesi always surprised his opponents.
meanings.sent5: Parchesying helps improve decision-making skills and patience.
